attributes.action: We petition the Prime Minister to ensure that the lives and rights of its citizens are protected wherever they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Law is clear that victims of deaths in suspicious or unnatural circumstances that have taken place abroad have the right to justice as if that incident occurred in the UK. However, those that administer this Law rarely comply. The effect of this is that these authorities could become, albeit unwittingly accomplices to covering up a crime.
 
We demand a voice for those who have lost their lives abroad.
